summary: The plot revolves around a robotic satellite with artificial intelligence that crash lands in Korea and contains clues for a father who is desperately searching for his missing daughter.
cast: Erik Brown|Soo-bin Chae|Dean Dawson|Lee Hanee|Jin-ah Kang|Yang Kyung-Won|Hee-Joon Lee|Sung-min Lee|Howard Neilson-Sewell|Kim Won-Hae
title: Robot Sound
